line1.text: Jake: Dad taught us everything about exploring! Even when we were too young to go out into the real world, we had our own adventures right in our backyard.

line2.text: Jake: It never got boring with Roy and Emily...

line1.text: Jake: But we got older and had fewer adventures with each other. Most times, they were busy with other stuff.

line2.text: Jake: I missed those times. Hopefully, one day, we could start again...
